data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Northern Islands, New Zealand.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern Islands, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Northern Islands, New Zealand know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 9,211,219 believers in Northern Islands to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Northern Islands, New Zealand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Somali people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, make bold the prophets in Northern Islands, New Zealand so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Northern Islands, New Zealand to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Northern Islands you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

location.name: Northern Islands
location.people_groups_list: Nepalese, South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Sinhalese, Kanarese, Gujarati
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nepalese (2,700), South Asian, Bengali-speaking (3,400), Sinhalese (1,100), Kanarese (1,500), Gujarati (25,000)
